wikipedia_page.main:
Huw Meredydd Stephens (born 25 May 1981) is a Welsh radio presenter, broadcasting on BBC Radio Cymru and BBC Radio 6 Music.
Stephens founded the Sŵn music festival with John Rostron and the yearly showcase Welsh Language Music Day.Most recently he produced the short film Anorac, about the Welsh language music scene. Huw presented the Cofiwch Dryweryn documentary for S4C, following the history of the graffiti that his father painted in 1963. Huw presented Cymru Rising on BBC Radio 4, documenting the Welsh language music scene.
